      The lower bound of values that an instance must meet to make satisfy this node's test
      private java.lang.Integer relation
      This describes the relation to node value that an instance must meet to satisfy this node's test EQUALS : instance value == branch value GREATER_THAN : instance value > branch value GREATER_THAN_EQUAL_TO : instance value >= branch value

      • relation

        private java.lang.Integer relation
        This describes the relation to node value that an instance must meet to satisfy this node's test EQUALS : instance value == branch value GREATER_THAN : instance value > branch value GREATER_THAN_EQUAL_TO : instance value >= branch value

      • nodeValue

        private java.lang.Double nodeValue
        The lower bound of values that an instance must meet to make satisfy this node's test

      • classCounts

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> classCounts
        Counts the number of instances that finally reached this node. The map maps a nominal value (class label) ID to a count

        The attribute this node tests
